item.title: My bankall command disconnects me when I have more than 23 items in my inventory
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

Here’s my bankall command:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("bankall")) { if (IsBanking) { for(int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) { bankItem(playerItems[i], i, playerItemsN[i]); } resetItems(3214); } }

It works perfect, except for when I have more than I think it’s 23 items. For some reason, whenever I have above 23 different items in my inventory, it disconnects me, yet, when I log back on, the items are banked. It won’t disconnect me if I have less than 23 items in my inventory. Also, it’s not throwing me any errors in my server window so I really don’t know what to look at to fix it. Would anyone know the problem or have experienced this before?

Read full topic
item.source: My bankall command disconnects me when I have more than 23 items in my inventory
